author: Joe Himelstein
title: Youbiquitor Dapp for gig workers
description: Apps like Uber, Doordash and others take advantage of independent contractors under the false promise that you can "be your own boss".
solution: Youbiquitor allows contractors to customize their business profile, personalize fee structures and offer various types of services.
experience: Entrepreneur, co-founded non-profit at age 18. 6+ years online marketing and sales. 14+ years unique experience in relevant industries.
